survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Virtual Fitness Class Platforms Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of virtual fitness class platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which virtual fitness class platform do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for manual entry. Keep the list updated with current popular platforms.
